action.text: <style>header,nav{display:block}html{font-family:sans-serif;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%;-ms-text-size-adjust:100%}body{margin:0}h1{font-size:2em}strong{font-weight:bold}small{font-size:80%}img{border:0}button,input{font-family:inherit;font-size:100%;margin:0}button,input{line-height:normal}button{-webkit-appearance:button}input[type="search"]{-webkit-appearance:textfield;-moz-box-sizing:content-box;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box}input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration{-webkit-appearance:none}button::-moz-focus-inner,input::-moz-focus-inner{border:0;padding:0}*,*:before,*:after{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}html{-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%}body{background:#FFFFFF;color:#000000;line-height:1}html,body,img{border:0}h1{font-size:100%;font-weight:normal}img{display:block}ol,ul{list-style:none}input[type="search"]{-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}@-ms-viewport{width:device-width}@-o-viewport{width:device-width}@viewport{width:device-width}a,button{-ms-touch-action:manipulation;touch-action:manipulation}body,button,input{font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;color:#636363;font-size:14px;line-height:1.5}a{color:#A0A0A0;text-decoration:none}ol,ul{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}h1{margin:0;margin-bottom:0.7em;color:#3399cc;font-family:"PT Sans","Helvetica Neue",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:28px;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;line-height:1.2;text-rendering:optimizeLegibility;text-transform:uppercase}.page-title h1{text-transform:uppercase;font-size:24px;font-weight:600;color:#636363;border-bottom:1px solid #ededed;padding-bottom:3px;margin-bottom:15px;text-transform:uppercase}.block{margin-bottom:20px}.block-subtitle{font-weight:bold;margin-bottom:7px}.button{background:#010101;display:inline-block;padding:7px 15px;border:0;color:#FFFFFF;font-size:13px;font-weight:normal;font-family:"PT Sans","Helvetica Neue",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;line-height:19px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap}.breadcrumbs{overflow:hidden;margin:-15px 0 15px;padding:0 0.1em}.breadcrumbs li{float:left;font-size:12px;font-family:"PT Sans","Helvetica Neue",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase}.breadcrumbs a{float:left;color:#D2D2D2}.breadcrumbs strong{color:#D2D2D2;font-weight:normal}.breadcrumbs span{float:left;padding:0 7px;color:#D2D2D2}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.breadcrumbs{display:none}}.page-header-container,#nav{max-width:1400px;margin:0 auto;clear:both}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.page-header-container,#nav{padding:0 2.4em}}.main-container{max-width:1400px}.main-container{position:relative;margin:0 auto;padding:15px}.main-container:after{content:'';display:table;clear:both}@media only screen and (min-width:480px){.main-container{padding:1% 3em;clear:both}}.main:after{content:'';display:table;clear:both}.col-main{padding:0 10px}.col-main{float:left;width:82.3%}.col2-right-layout .col-main{padding-left:0}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.col-main,.col2-right-layout .col-main{padding:0;margin-bottom:10px;float:none;width:auto}.col-main{float:none;width:auto}}.std p{margin:0 0 1.5em}.input-box{padding-top:2px}.input-box:after{content:'';display:table;clear:both}label{display:inline-block;font-size:13px;font-family:"PT Sans","Helvetica Neue",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-weight:600}.input-text{-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none;-webkit-border-radius:2px;-moz-border-radius:2px;-ms-border-radius:2px;-o-border-radius:2px;border-radius:0;border:1px solid #DEDEDE;background:#FFFFFF;font-size:15px}input[type=search]{height:30px;padding:0 8px}input[type=search]{width:365px;max-width:100%}@media only screen and (max-device-width:568px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:0){input[type=search]{font-size:16px}}::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#a0a0a0}input:-moz-placeholder{color:#a0a0a0}html,body{height:100%}.wrapper{min-width:320px;min-height:100%;margin:0 auto;background:#FFFFFF}.wrapper:after{content:'';display:table;clear:both}#top-header{display:none}.separator{display:inline-block;color:transparent;width:.7em}#top-header p{display:inline-block}#top-header .left{float:left;width:auto}#top-header .right{float:right;width:auto}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.page-header{margin:0 auto;padding:0.5em 2.3em}.page-header-container{position:relative}#top-header{background-color:#F3F3F3;float:left;width:100%;color:#A2A2A2;display:block;font-size:0.9em;padding:0.3em 0em 0.2em 0em}}.page-header{font-family:"PT Sans","Helvetica Neue",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;float:left;width:100%}@media (min-width:768px){.page-header{padding:0.9em 0}}.page-header-container .store-language-container{display:none!important;float:right;max-width:35%;padding:13px 15px 10px 10px}@media only screen and (max-width:479px){.page-header-container .store-language-container{padding-top:8px}}.logo{min-height:44px;text-align:center;padding:0.2em 0;max-width:18em;display:block;margin:0 auto}.logo img{max-width:100%}.logo .small{display:block;margin:0 auto}.logo .large{display:none}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.logo{max-width:300px;min-height:4.2em;float:left}.logo .small{display:none}.logo .large{display:block;max-width:11.8em;padding:0.2em 0.8em}}.skip-links{overflow:hidden;border-top:1px solid #EDEDED;border-bottom:1px solid #EDEDED;line-height:3em}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-links{border:0;float:right;display:inline-block;width:auto;line-height:1em;font-size:1.1em}.account-cart-wrapper{display:flex;float:right;padding:1.2em 0}}.skip-link{position:relative;float:left;width:25%;background:#FFFFFF;color:#A0A0A2;line-height:auto;text-align:center;font-size:1.1em}a.skip-link{text-decoration:none}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.skip-links{width:100%}.skip-link{border-right:1px solid #EDEDED}}@media only screen and (min-width:500px){.skip-link{width:25%}}.skip-link .label{display:none}@media only screen and (min-width:500px){.skip-link .label{display:inline;font-size:0.9em}}.skip-content{display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){#header-account li a,.nav-primary a.level0{padding:0 15px 0 25px;border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc;text-align:left;color:#636363;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:30px}#header-account li:last-child a,.nav-primary li.level0:last-child a.level0{border-bottom:0}}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.account-cart-wrapper{position:static}}.skip-nav{width:25%}@media only screen and (min-width:500px){.skip-nav{width:25%}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-nav{display:none}}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){#header-nav{padding:0 2.3em}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){#header-nav{display:block;margin:inherit;background:#FFFFFF;float:left;width:100%}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.nav-primary{display:block;margin-top:0}}.nav-primary a{text-decoration:none;position:relative;display:block;color:#484848;line-height:2em;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:1em;font-weight:500}.nav-primary li{position:relative}.nav-primary li.level1 a{border-bottom:1px solid #cccccc}.nav-primary li.level0 > a{text-transform:uppercase}.nav-primary li.level0 > a:first-child{}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.nav-primary a.level0,.nav-primary a{line-height:35px}.nav-primary li.level0 ul{display:none}.nav-primary li.level0 li{padding:0 0 0 25px}.nav-primary li.level1 a{padding:0 15px 0 25px}.nav-primary li.parent > a:after{content:'';position:absolute;width:0;height:0;display:block;border-top:5px solid transparent;border-bottom:5px solid transparent;border-left:5px solid #cccccc;border-right:none;top:50%;left:10px;right:auto;margin-top:-5px}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.nav-primary{}.nav-primary a.level0{padding:0 0.6em;color:#808080}.nav-primary li.level0,.nav-primary a.level0{display:inline-block}.nav-primary li:last-child > a{border-bottom:none}.nav-primary li.level0 ul{background:#FBFBFB;border:solid 1px #cccccc;position:absolute;left:0;top:28px;z-index:10;width:250px;padding-left:10px;padding-right:10px;display:none}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-search{display:none}}#header-search{padding:1.6em}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){#header-search{width:40%;margin-right:1.1em;margin-left:0.9em;margin:0 auto;display:block;padding:0.5em 0}}@media only screen and (max-width:960px) and (min-width:771px){#header-search{float:right;margin-right:0.9em}}#search_mini_form .input-box{position:relative;padding-top:0;height:auto;display:inline-block;width:100%}#search_mini_form label{display:none}#search{width:100%;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;border:1px solid #D0D0D0;font-size:1.1em;padding:0.6em 0.8em;height:auto;border-radius:0.3em}#search_mini_form .search-button{position:absolute;top:0;color:#A0A0A2;right:0;border:0;background:none;font-size:1.4em;padding:0.6em 0.7em 0.6em 0.6em;border-left:1px solid rgba(204,204,204,0.48)}#search_mini_form .search-button:before{content:'';position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;width:30px;height:30px;margin-top:-15px;margin-left:-15px;background-position:4px -146px}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-account .fa{}.skip-account{float:none;width:auto;vertical-align:top;display:inline-block;padding:0 0.4em}#header-account a{display:block;padding:5px 10px;color:#636363;line-height:2}}#header-account{padding:5px 0}#header-account a{position:relative;display:block;padding:5px 10px;line-height:23px;text-align:center}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-cart{width:auto;padding:0 10px}}.skip-cart .count{-webkit-border-radius:12px;-moz-border-radius:12px;-ms-border-radius:12px;-o-border-radius:12px;border-radius:12px;display:inline-block;top:-6px;position:relative;z-index:5;width:22px;height:22px;background:rgba(51,153,204,0.9);color:#FFFFFF;font-size:11px;line-height:22px;text-align:center;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif}.skip-cart.no-count .count{display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:499px){.skip-cart .count{margin-left:-12px}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-cart{color:#A0A0A2}.skip-cart .count{-webkit-border-radius:0px;-moz-border-radius:0px;-ms-border-radius:0px;-o-border-radius:0px;border-radius:0px;position:static;background:none;margin-left:0px;font-size:14px;width:auto}.skip-cart .count:before{content:'('}.skip-cart .count:after{content:')'}.skip-cart .count{color:#3399cc}}.footer .form-subscribe-header{display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:1240px){}#header-nav + .main-container{padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0}.header-minicart{display:inline-block}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.header-minicart{display:block}}.header-minicart .minicart-message{display:block;padding:10px}.header-minicart .empty{padding:10px;text-align:center}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper{clear:both;position:relative}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before,.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:after{content:'';position:absolute;top:0px;left:0px;width:100%;height:100%;display:none}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before{background-color:white;opacity:0.8;z-index:2}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:after{background-image:url("../images/opc-ajax-loader.gif");background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center;z-index:3}.header-minicart .block-cart{display:none}.header-minicart .block-subtitle{color:#636363;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:10px;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.4;padding:5px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:0px}.header-minicart .block-subtitle .close{width:40px;float:right;display:block;color:#636363;text-decoration:none;font-weight:normal;font-size:30px;position:absolute;top:-8px;right:-3px}.header-minicart #minicart-error-message{text-align:center;color:red;display:none}.header-minicart #minicart-success-message{text-align:center;color:green;display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:479px){.header-minicart a.skip-cart{z-index:1}}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before{background-color:#EDEDED}}.search-autocomplete{left:0!important;overflow:visible!important;position:relative!important;top:15px!important;width:100%!important;z-index:200}.cms-page-view .page-title h1{border:none}.cms-page-view .std p{color:#636363;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-style:italic;line-height:24px}.cms-page-view .std h1{color:#3399cc}@font-face{font-family:'PT Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('PT Sans'),local('PTSans-Regular'),url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v8/ATKpv8nLYAKUYexo8iqqrg.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2212,U+2215,U+E0FF,U+EFFD,U+F000}@font-face{font-family:'PT Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local('PT Sans Bold'),local('PTSans-Bold'),url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v8/0XxGQsSc1g4rdRdjJKZrNPk_vArhqVIZ0nv9q090hN8.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2212,U+2215,U+E0FF,U+EFFD,U+F000}</style>

block.name: left_first
block.label: Left Column First (shows above main column on smaller screens)

.search-button{position:absolute;top:0;color:#A0A0A2;right:0;border:0;background:none;font-size:1.4em;padding:0.6em 0.7em 0.6em 0.6em;border-left:1px solid rgba(204,204,204,0.48)}#search_mini_form .search-button:before{content:'';position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;width:30px;height:30px;margin-top:-15px;margin-left:-15px;background-position:4px -146px}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-account .fa{}.skip-account{float:none;width:auto;vertical-align:top;display:inline-block;padding:0 0.4em}#header-account a{display:block;padding:5px 10px;color:#636363;line-height:2}}#header-account{padding:5px 0}#header-account a{position:relative;display:block;padding:5px 10px;line-height:23px;text-align:center}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-cart{width:auto;padding:0 10px}}.skip-cart .count{-webkit-border-radius:12px;-moz-border-radius:12px;-ms-border-radius:12px;-o-border-radius:12px;border-radius:12px;display:inline-block;top:-6px;position:relative;z-index:5;width:22px;height:22px;background:rgba(51,153,204,0.9);color:#FFFFFF;font-size:11px;line-height:22px;text-align:center;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif}.skip-cart.no-count .count{display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:499px){.skip-cart .count{margin-left:-12px}}@media only screen and (min-width:771px){.skip-cart{color:#A0A0A2}.skip-cart .count{-webkit-border-radius:0px;-moz-border-radius:0px;-ms-border-radius:0px;-o-border-radius:0px;border-radius:0px;position:static;background:none;margin-left:0px;font-size:14px;width:auto}.skip-cart .count:before{content:'('}.skip-cart .count:after{content:')'}.skip-cart .count{color:#3399cc}}.footer .form-subscribe-header{display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:1240px){}#header-nav + .main-container{padding-top:0;padding-bottom:0}.homeslideshow{clear:both;margin-bottom:0.8%}.header-minicart{display:inline-block}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.header-minicart{display:block}}.header-minicart .minicart-message{display:block;padding:10px}.header-minicart .empty{padding:10px;text-align:center}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper{clear:both;position:relative}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before,.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:after{content:'';position:absolute;top:0px;left:0px;width:100%;height:100%;display:none}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before{background-color:white;opacity:0.8;z-index:2}.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:after{background-image:url("../images/opc-ajax-loader.gif");background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center;z-index:3}.header-minicart .block-cart{display:none}.header-minicart .block-subtitle{color:#636363;font-family:"PT Sans",Verdana,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:10px;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.4;padding:5px;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin-bottom:0px}.header-minicart .block-subtitle .close{width:40px;float:right;display:block;color:#636363;text-decoration:none;font-weight:normal;font-size:30px;position:absolute;top:-8px;right:-3px}.header-minicart #minicart-error-message{text-align:center;color:red;display:none}.header-minicart #minicart-success-message{text-align:center;color:green;display:none}@media only screen and (max-width:479px){.header-minicart a.skip-cart{z-index:1}}@media only screen and (max-width:770px){.header-minicart .minicart-wrapper:before{background-color:#EDEDED}}.search-autocomplete{left:0!important;overflow:visible!important;position:relative!important;top:15px!important;width:100%!important;z-index:200}@font-face{font-family:'PT Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('PT Sans'),local('PTSans-Regular'),url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v8/ATKpv8nLYAKUYexo8iqqrg.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2212,U+2215,U+E0FF,U+EFFD,U+F000}@font-face{font-family:'PT Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local('PT Sans Bold'),local('PTSans-Bold'),url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v8/0XxGQsSc1g4rdRdjJKZrNPk_vArhqVIZ0nv9q090hN8.woff2)
